name: ``Car Parking Games Sports Steer Driving Impossible Challenge
name_original: ``Car Parking Games Sports Steer Driving Impossible Challenge
description:
Ever wondered what its like to drive a sports car? Now here's your chance! Test drive these awesome sports cars in this Ultimate Parking Challenge. Real steering and real handling. Are you up for the challenge?

Choose from different camera views to get the right angle while not damaging your car. We give you lives but they will be lost easily if you're driving is off. Play again until you've master your skills over and over.

[Game Features]
- Beautifully crafted 3D graphics.
- 30 Levels, Challenging, try for yourself
- Multiple environments: Play during the Day, Night, and Rainy Scenery
- Many sports cars including the BONUS Pink Long Limo

[Power-ups]
- Weather Control
- Wheel Sets
- Extra Lives
- Repair kits
and more..

Play Action Car Parking Games Sports Car Driving Impossible Challenge today!

PLEASE NOTE:
- This game is free to play but in app purchases charges real money within the app. You can adjust your device settings to lock out in app purchasing.
